data.title: Exeter City Community Trust
data.meta_description: The Trust The Exeter City Supporters’ Trust, abbreviated as ECFCST, is a supporters’ trust consisting of fans of Exeter City. It is the majority shareholder of Exeter City, controlling 53.6% of the voting shares in the club. Adam Stansfield Foundation Following Adam’s death on 10th August 2010 and his funeral on 25th August 2010, Adam’s […]
data.text:
The Terry O’ Neill Trust Fund

We are very grateful to receive a generous donation from the Terry O’Neill Trust Fund to ensure we can provide football opportunities to those who otherwise may not be able to access our programmes.

Terry O’Neill was an Exeter City FC fan whose life sadly ended at the age of 16. His family would like to honour their son and brother with a legacy gift to the young people of Exeter. The fund will, every year, help to buy football kit and subsidise other sport and physical activity expenses for those in the city in need.
